foods.description: SPICY PENNE ARRABBIATA PENNE PASTA WITH A SPICY TOMATO BASIL SAUCE & PARMESAN CHEESE, SPICY PENNE ARRABBIATA
foods.lowercaseDescription: spicy penne arrabbiata penne pasta with a spicy tomato basil sauce & parmesan cheese, spicy penne arrabbiata
foods.ingredients: COOKED ENRICHED PASTA (WATER, SEMOLINA WHEAT FLOUR, NIACIN, FERROUS SULFATE, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, RIBOFLAVIN, FOLIC ACID), TOMATO PUREE (WATER, TOMATO PASTE), TOMATOES (DICED TOMATOES, TOMATO JUICE, CITRIC ACID, CALCIUM CHLORIDE), WATER, PARMESAN CHEESE (CULTURED MILK, SALT, ENZYMES), ONIONS, 2% OR LESS OF BROWN SUGAR, SPICES, GARLIC, RICE STARCH, SOYBEAN OIL, SALT.

foods.ingredients: TUSCAN SEASONED CHICKEN THIGHS: SALT, SPICES, DEHYDRATED RED AND GREEN BELL PEPPER, SUGAR, DEHYDRATED GARLIC, DEHYDRATED ONION, MALTODEXTRIN, NATURAL FLAVORS, DEHYDRATED PARSLEY, SOYBEAN OIL (AS A PROCESSING AID),GUM ARABIC, NOT MORE THAN 2% SILICON DIOXIDE ADDED TO PREVENT CAKING. VINEGAR. CHEESE TORTELLINI: DURUM FLOUR, WATER, WHEAT FLOUR, RICOTTA CHEESE (PASTEURIZED MILK, CHEESE CULTURES, SALT, ENZYMES, CELLULOSE POWDER, NATAMYCIN), SWISS CHEESE (PASTEURIZED COW'S MILK, CULTURES, SALT, ENZYMES), PASTEURIZED WHOLE EGGS, PARMESAN CHEESE (PASTEURIZED MILK, CHEESE CULTURES, SALT, ENZYMES), ROMANO CHEESE (PASTEURIZED MILK, CHEESE CULTURES, SALT, ENZYMES, POWDERED CELLULOSE), BREAD CRUMBS (UNBLEACHED WHEAT FLOUR, CANE SUGAR, YEAST, SEA SALT), MODIFIED POTATO STARCH, FIBERS (BAMBOO, PSYLLIUM), SEA SALT, GORGONZOLA CRUMBLE (PASTEURIZED MILK, CHEESE, CULTURES, SALT, ENZYMES), GARLIC, BLACK PEPPER, SUNFLOWER OIL, BETA CAROTENE (MALTODEXTRIN, ACACIA, COCONUT OIL, SUCROSE, SODIUM ASCORBATE, DL-A-TOCOPHEROL, SILICON DIOXIDE), NUTMEG. SPICY TOMATO ARRABBIATA SAUCE: TOMATOES (TOMATOES, TOMATO JUICE, CITRIC ACID), TOMATO PUREE, WATER, OLIVE OIL, ONION, CONTAINS 2% OR LESS OF WHITE WINE, GARLIC, SALT, SUGAR, SPICES, ONION POWDER.
